name: Taller Technologies Argentina
tagline: Software Services - Mobile, Web and Embedded
description:
Taller Technologies Argentina is a company that offers customized high-quality software development services. We support our international clients with the following services:
- Development of embedded and real-time software for mission-critical and high-availability systems.
- Mobile application development for both Apple and Android platforms.
- Development of web applications and services.
Our Company is comprised of professionals coming from diverse backgrounds: systems engineering, computer science, and electronic engineering. We have an extensive experience working on global software projects.
We have achieved successful results both in demanding high-quality environments applying strict engineering practices, and in high-volatility businesses where flexibility and time to market are crucial.
We have more than 60 employees working at our offices in Córdoba (Argentina).
We offer multidisciplinary teams with the required skills to develop software products, from the business analysis/product definition up to its implementation, from user experience, project management, software architecture to testing and deployment into production.
